description:
####
## Generic Experiment information

Please fill in the information below.

label: Experiment ID
description: Enter a unique experiment name.

label: Experiment Title
description: A short phrase that can help in interpreting the unique experiment IDs.
placeholder: e.g., AMIP plus 4K sea surface temperature

label: Description
description: Describe the experiment configuration conditions and requirements.
placeholder: Describe the experiment configuration conditions and requirements...

label: Reference DOI
description: If available, enter the reference doi(s) here separated by a space.

label: Alias
description: Alternative names the experiment may be referred to internally or in publication. Space delimit.

label: MIP / Activity ID (registered)
description: Select the MIP / activity owning the experiment.

label: Parent Information and Tier
description: ####\n## Parent information and Tier

label: Parent Experiment
description: Select the experiment that provides initial conditions.

label: Custom Parent Experiment
description: Only fill this if your parent experiment is not in the list above.

label: Priority Tier
description: Select the experiment's priority level.

label: Model Component Requirements
description:
####
## Model Component Requirements

Select the required and optional model components for this experiment.

label: Source type codes for required model components
description: Select all that apply.

label: Source type codes for additional allowed model components
description: Select all that apply.

label: Experiment Duration Start and End
description: ####\n## Experiment duration, start and end\nSome additional information on the experiment

label: Start Date
description: Enter the start date in YYYY-MM-DD format, or 'none' if not applicable.

label: Branch Date
description: Add the branch date if known, otherwise enter 'none'.

label: (Minimum) Number of Years
description: Enter the minimum number of simulation years required.

description: This is pre-set and cannot be changed.
